price: 15. Naharsi ginot taannee? Aleey ma-taaninninok, nammay haytoh ken ginnaah kah sugen innah ken gacisnaamak mannal taannaah? Wonna hinnay usun qusba ginok agay waagat yanin.
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afaʿayīnā bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin
